answerText: Name this novella in which the title character meets Amaso Delano, the captain of the Bachelor's Delight, who saves the title character from murder at the hands of his ship's crew.[10] Melville, the author of Benito Cereno, also wrote the story "Billy Budd" in which the title character has a speech impediment and so resorts to punching, and incidentally killing, this other character.
heading: Penn Bowl |2012 | Editors Packet 3 | 7 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The servant Babo in this novella turns out to be the real leader of the San Dominick. FTPE: [10] Name this novella in which the title character meets Amaso Delano, the captain of the Bachelor's Delight, who saves the title character from murder at the hands of his ship's crew.
